Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{3: 'When you finally wake, you start at the sight of Lucia sitting in the corner of your quarters, calm as a lotus flower.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, you're finally awake.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'First... I must offer you my apologies.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why are you apologizing?', 3: '9', 4: "It's okay.", 5: '10'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'For the... "failed experiments" I made you eat. I should have known that there was more to food than its appearance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Thank you, Commandant. I knew you would not hold it against me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Please don't take this the wrong way, but... watching you faint made me realize a great many things about myself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Not just the old me, but the new me, as well.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The new you?', 3: '13', 4: 'Have you processed all your memories?', 5: '14'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I had my doubts, but they won't be a problem anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Not all of it, but the rest won't be a problem.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'A lot of people have been turning up, looking for you for various reasons, Commandant. But I sent them all away.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nothing important, I hope?', 3: '16', 4: "Why didn't you wake me?", 5: '17'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Some important, some less so. But I took care of them all promptly.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Because the exhaustion must be piling up for you, what with our recent missions and... incidents. I took the liberty of safeguarding your rest.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'There are no missions scheduled today, so you can rest easy. I will take watch.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kind of hard to fall asleep with someone watching.', 3: '19', 4: "Shouldn't you go get some rest too?", 5: '20'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Is that so... I can turn awayâ€”I guess that wouldn't help any.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Taking watch is rest enough for me, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "What's with that expression...? We've been together like this for long, Commandant, even if I wasn't always privy to your condition...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'According to the records, you were the one person whom I have been with the longest. I am simply adhering to my past behavior.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So... in short.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I would like to share our time together, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Whoa...', 3: '25', 4: "If that's what you'd like...", 5: '25'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "No, please don't answer. I did not express my feelings to elicit a reply.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As she speaks, Lucia presents you with a paper crane. It's been carefully folded countless times, and you can faintly make out scribbles in between the creases."}
{3: 'From the scribbles, you make out a set of groundside coordinates, close to the new HQ you set up together, and these words: "I hope that you\'ll be there, at the appointed time."'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Simply put... I'm asking you out on a date.", 4: '1'}
